pull.title: qa: Make tmpdir option an absolute path, misc cleanup
pull.body:
This should fix issues with the multiwallet test and its symlinks
when the tmpdir is a relative path.

Rather than fixing os.symlink to work with paths relative to a
directory descriptor, which does not work on Windows, normalize
the path instead.

events.body: utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11472/commits/fa949d1bd6710358626eb70a47dfa101c0a60da2, storing paths as absolute is always a good precaution to prevent unexpected behavior.

utACK.

Should the same applies to `cachedir`?

> Should the same applies to cachedir?

I think that makes sense (not sure it's in scope of this issue though).

Tested ACK fa949d1bd6710358626eb70a47dfa101c0a60da2.

:+1: for the same treatment to cachedir

events.message:
qa: Make tmpdir option an absolute path

This should fix issues with the multiwallet test and symlinks
when the tmpdir is a relative path.

Rather than fixing os.symlink to work with paths relative to a
directory descriptor, which does not work on Windows, normalize
the path instead.
qa: Remove never used return value of sync_with_ping

rename.from: qa: Make tmpdir option an absolute path
rename.to: qa: Make tmpdir option an absolute path, misc cleanup
